changed_products.title: Glean Black Stone Restorer & Sealer: 1L Water Based, Premium Black Stone Protector for Interior & Exterior Surfaces

description:
BACK TO BLACK RESTORER: Premium water based formulation restores and seals natural and manmade black stone surfaces. 
   PROTECTS SURFACE: Premium grade stone and masonry impregnator, penetrates into the surface to provide an invisible barrier, which protects natural and man-made stone surfaces from penetration by water, oil, dirt, limescale and grease. 
   SUITABLE FOR: All Black Stone such as Limestone, Slate, Marble, Porcelain, Granite and Concrete. 
   INTERIOR & EXTERIOR: Perfect for use both indoors and outdoors. 
   FOR OPTIMAL RESULTS: We recommend using GLEAN Black Stone Restorer & Sealer in conjunction with GLEAN Heavy Duty Floor & Stone Degreaser. 
   COVERAGE: 15-30m² per Litre 
  MADE IN BRITAIN

BACK TO BLACK STONE RESTORER:
Water-based formulation with black pigmentation revives dull, faded stone in one application. Restores the deep, rich colour of black limestone, slate, marble and concrete.

  
   PROFESSIONAL IMPREGNATING SEALER:
Penetrates deeply to create an invisible barrier that protects against water, oil, grease, dirt, and limescale. Prevents long-term damage and staining.

  
   IDEAL FOR ALL DARK STONE SURFACES:
Perfect for black limestone, slate, marble, granite, concrete, porcelain and other natural and man-made stone surfaces — indoors and outdoors.

  
   LONG-LASTING PROTECTION:
Enhances the natural tone while sealing and safeguarding stone from everyday wear, weathering, and contaminants. Helps maintain a premium finish for longer.

  
   EASY BRUSH OR CLOTH APPLICATION:
Apply to a clean, dry surface and let it absorb. Additional coats can be applied every 2 hours until the desired depth of colour is achieved. Coverage: 15–30m² per litre.

  
   FOR BEST RESULTS:
Use after cleaning with GLEAN Heavy Duty Floor & Stone Degreaser to ensure maximum absorption and colour restoration. Made in Britain.

changed_products.title: Glean Grout Reviver & Sealer Kit - Black - Foam Brush Included - Renew & Refresh Tile Grout
Glean Green Clean Algae Remover 1 Litre - Concentrated Formula for Algae, Moss & Lichen - No Rinse Needed
Glean Patio Grout - Grey - 15kg - 20m² Coverage - Ready-to-use, Weatherproof, Weed Resistant, Non-staining
Quartz & Granite Cleaner Aerosol 400ml | Non-Abrasive Foaming Stone Worktop Cleaner 2 x 400ml
Glean Kitchen Cupboard Cleaner - Easy To Use - Anti-Static, Streak Free, Foaming Spray for High Gloss Surfaces

description:
DIFFICULT SURFACES: Specially developed formula which is well suited at cleaning difficult, high gloss surfaces including cupboards, laminate, worktops and appliances. 
   PROTECTS SURFACES: The anti-static properties keep your surfaces free from dust, leaving them cleaner and clearer for longer. 
   STREAK FREE CLEAN: Highly effective streak free cleaner, perfect for all gloss surfaces and leaves your glass and mirrored surfaces streak free. 
   GENTLE FOAMING CLEANER: This gentle cleaner is suited for all surfaces, with a soft foaming action and incredible fragrance, you won't be disappointed. 
   SIMPLE TO USE: Apply to the surface and simply wipe clean using a clean microfibre cloth. 
  MADE IN BRITAIN

ANTI-STATIC FOAMING CLEANER:
Specially developed foaming formula cleans and protects kitchen cupboards, leaving a smooth finish that repels dust and keeps surfaces cleaner for longer.

  
   PERFECT FOR HIGH GLOSS & DIFFICULT SURFACES:
Designed for cleaning lacquered, laminate, gloss, and matt furniture. Ideal for modern high-gloss kitchens where streaking is a common problem.

  
   STREAK-FREE SHINE:
Cleans fingerprints, grease, smudges, and everyday dirt without leaving streaks — restoring clarity and shine to cupboards, cabinets, and worktops.

  
   GENTLE BUT EFFECTIVE:
Non-abrasive, soft-foaming action suitable for delicate surfaces. Safe for kitchen use and leaves a fresh, clean fragrance.

  
   QUICK & EASY APPLICATION:
Simply spray, allow to foam, and wipe with a clean microfibre cloth. Perfect for cupboards, doors, appliances, worktops, and furniture.

  
   MADE IN BRITAIN:
Premium British-made formula designed for modern homes and long-lasting surface protection.
